trope_detail: Scotty began his Enterprise career as helmsman.
ep_title: Where No Man Has Gone Before

trope_detail: Scotty climbs out of Jefferies Tube near engineering working to get into engineering.
Scotty: I can't change the laws of physics.
Scotty gets engines started in less than 30 minutes. And they said it couldn't be doneâ€¦
Restarting cold engines has never been tried. The odds are enormous. But Scotty and Spock attempt to do the impossible.
Scotty uses a phaser as a cutting torch to cut through the bulkhead.
Scotty MacGyvered the shuttlecraft to work by using the power in the phasers.
Khans man fights Scotty. Scotty knocks him out.

Ship's Log-4 (Scotty): stardate 3193.0. Chief Engineer Scott recording. The Captain and First Officer are overdue and missing on the surface of Eminiar Seven. I have taken standard precautionary measures while we continue our attempts to locate them.
Scotty: Open a channel, Lt.

trope: Screw The Rules, I'm Doing What's Right
trope_detail: Scotty wisely refuses to follow Ambassador Foxs tactically stupid orders, despite acknowledging that Fox outranks him.
Scotty comforts Lt. Carolyn Palamas after Apollo is defeated.
Scotty rushes Apollo to protect <t. Carolyn Palamas and gets knocked on his ass by a lightning bolt
Scotty attacks Apollo and gets shocked to the ground.
Lt. Carolyn Palamas is Scotty muse this week but Lt. Carolyn Palamas falls in love with Apollo.
Scotty gently courts Lt. Carolyn Palamas then attempts to defend her honor.
Scotty ask Lt. Carolyn Palamas if shed like to go for coffee.
Scotty feels the need to protect Lt. Carolyn Palamas from Apollo.
Scotty attacks Nomad, gets thrown back by energy bolt.
Scotty diverts warp power to the shields to defend against Nomad's energy bolts.
Scotty killed by Nomads energy beam. Nomad repaired the damage and Scotty was alive again.
Scotty working in the Jefferies Tube to route power to the transporter so they can cross the dimensional rift.
Scotty working in the Jeffries Tubes on Mirror Enterprise.
Scotty: Condtion Red.
Scotty repairs circuits in Jefferies Tube for transporters
Scotty attacks Spock with mace.
Scotty gets shown technology unlike anything He's seen before in the alien labs.

Ship's Log-1 (Scotty): Stardate 3219.8. Lieutenant Commander Scott recording in the absence of Captain Kirk. A shuttlecraft bearing the Captain, the first officer, Chief Surgeon McCoy, and Assistant Federation Commissioner Hedford is now definitely overdue for a rendezvous with the Enterprise. We are attempting to backtrack it.
Ship's Log-2 (Scotty): Stardate 3220.3. Lieutenant Commander Scott reporting in lieu of the Captain and the first officer. We are continuing our search for the missing shuttlecraft.
